entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
